dj2.gui

Class MusicTrackListPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTabbedPane
            • dj2.gui.MusicTrackListPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MostRecentlyPlayedListPane, PlayListPane

    public abstract class MusicTrackListPane
extends javax.swing.JTabbedPane
    This class is inherited by PlayListPane and MostRecentlyPlayedListPane that use its content since they have common attributes with it. It is abstract because it has the update method that will be implemented differently depnding on the class that extends it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
